src:
Belum Gabung Latihan, Persebaya Ungkap Kondisi Terkini Otavio Dutra
02 Nov 2019, 12:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso membeberkan kondisi terkini Otavio Dutra. Menurut Aji, pemain naturalisasi asal Brasil tersebut masih fokus memulihkan cederanya.
Sehingga dia tidak mau memaksakan Dutra untuk datang latihan. Namun, dia memastikan, awal pekan depan, mantan bek Bhayangkara FC tersebut sudah bergabung dengan tim.
"Dutra insyaallah hari Senin sudah mulai latihan," kata Aji Santoso usai memimpin latihan di Lapangan Mapolda Jatim, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
"Dia kondisinya memang sakit, dia engkelnya juga bermasalah, makanya saya juga tidak mau memaksa pemain yang dalam keadaan enggak fit untuk ikut latihan," sambungnya.
Otavio Dutra mengalami cedera ketika membela timnas Indonesia pada kualifikasi Piala Dunia 2022 melawan Vietnam. Dia sudah absen membela Green Force dalam tiga pertandingan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Not Joining Exercise, Persebaya Reveals Otavio Dutra's Current Conditions
02 Nov 2019, 12:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya coach, Aji Santoso revealed the current condition of Otavio Dutra. According to Aji, the naturalized Brazilian player is still focused on restoring his injury.
So he did not want to force Dutra to come to practice. However, he confirmed, early next week, the former Bhayangkara FC defender had joined the team.
"Dutra, God willing, Monday has begun training," said Aji Santoso after leading the training at the East Java Regional Police Headquarters, Saturday (11/02/2019).
"His condition is indeed sick, he has problematic ankles too, so I also do not want to force players who are not fit to join training," he continued.
Otavio Dutra suffered an injury while defending the Indonesian national team in the 2022 World Cup qualifier against Vietnam. He has missed the Green Force defense in three matches.
